explains: n. 总统当选人；已当选而尚未就职的总统

sentences.en: The president-elect followed in an open carriage drawn by six beautiful grey horses.
sentences.cn: 新当选的总统紧随其后，坐着6匹灰色骏马开道的敞篷马车。

sentences.en: This year there will be 10 official balls to celebrate the inauguration of President-elect Barack Obama.
sentences.cn: 今年将有10场官方舞会来庆祝奥巴马就职。

sentences.en: I was surprised at first by how many readers gave their main hope as simply that the President-Elect survive.
sentences.cn: 最初令我惊讶的是许多读者对奥巴马的最大希望只是他能幸存。
